name: Rainy world and memories DEMO
description:
PREFACE:

This game is a demo version of a future game, therefore, most likely, you will encounter bugs and shortcomings during the gameplay. I would be very grateful if you let me know about the bugs you found, thanks in advance for helping with development and just for playing my game :3

LORE:

There is a slight semblance of lore in the game, but it is not served directly and it may be difficult to understand it. It is also worth noting that since this is a demo version, a lot of the game will not be explained.

FULL VERSION RELEASE:

if you are interested in the game and you want to play the full version, then its release will take place in the summer of 2022. But since I am working on the game alone, the game will probably be released at a later date, but it will definitely be released in 2022 :>

also after the release of the full version, I plan to further develop the project. As far as possible, I will release DLC to the game and patches.
